subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Reyes’s agent has told the Mets that Reyes will not talk about a new contract during the 2011 season, as Reyes went 0 for 5 in the Mets loss to the Athletics.
snippet: Jose Reyes’s agent has told the Mets that Reyes will not talk about a new contract during the 2011 season, as Reyes went 0 for 5 in the Mets loss to the Athletics.
